name: SoP Windows DNS Auto Flush
short_description:
This batch file runs a quick couple of commands for windows CMD that will automatically flush your DNS when ran. You can run it manually or place it in your windows Startup folder to run every time windows starts up.

Yes yes I know, "iomaga no itz a batch filez", well yeah, this also allows you to see what it does by opening it in TXT editor, so there are no viruses and no tricks up anyone's sleeves. Just right click in windows and click edit and you will see the code in it.

Created by r00t of SoP
